con:part.con:content:
<wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:sch6="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1" xmlns:sch5="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com" xmlns:sch4="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1" xmlns:sch3="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1" xmlns:sch2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1" xmlns:sch1="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:sch0="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:pref="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:paymentcreditor:v1" xmlns:edb="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1" xmlns:ct="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1" xmlns:crtr="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1" xmlns:co="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Services for handling predefined creditors [Create, Update, Delete, Search(list), Confirm, Approve].
Approve is not implemented yet. Confirm will set to final status.
Normal flow is create -> confirm to make a creditor available for use, but a bank parameterer exists that make sure a Create will set final status.
Error Conditions (responseState.ErrorCode): 12=Not found (search) 70=Technical error 6432=Predefined creditor already approved (Approve) 6433=Predefined creditor is incomplete (Approve, Confirm) 6435=Predefined creditor is not found (Update, Approve, Confirm, Delete) 6478=Predefined creditor already confirmed (Confirm) 6479=Predefined creditor has not yet been confirmed (Approve) 6484=No agreement can be found for this user (Approve, Search) 6495=Predefined creditor status is not valid for update (Update) 6508=Duplicate creditor account for predefined creditor (Create, update) 6000=Validation error (Create, update)[When this ErrorCode is received, you need to check responseState.errorItem for the specific error items, shown below]
Validation Errors (responseState.errorItem): 6401=Invalid creditor agent identification (Creditor agent) 6402=Invalid creditor account number (Creditor account) 6403=Invalid creditor account number length (Creditor account) 6406=Invalid creditor country code (Creditor) 6417=Invalid creditor agent BIC identification (Creditor Agent) 6428=Account number missing (Creditor account) 6431=A creditor with this supplier number already exists (Supplier number) 6437=Invalid ultimate creditor country code (Ultimate creditor) 6458=Invalid identification for intermediary agent 1 (Intermediary agent) 6459=Invalid BIC identification for intermediary agent 1 (Intermediary Agent) 6460=Invalid BIC identification for intermediary agent 2 (Intermediary Agent) 6461=Invalid BIC identification for intermediary agent 3 (Intermediary Agent) 6462=Invalid identification for intermediary agent 2 (Intermediary agent) 6466=Invalid identification for intermediary agent 3 (Intermediary agent) 6473=Creditor agent identification is missing (Creditor Agent) 6481=Identification for intermediary agent 1 is missing (Intermediary agent) 6482=Identification for intermediary agent 2 is missing (Intermediary agent) 6483=Identification for intermediary agent 3 is missing (Intermediary agent) 6486=Invalid country for intermediary agent 1 (Intermediary Agent) 6487=Invalid country for intermediary agent 2 (Intermediary Agent) 6488=Invalid country for intermediary agent 3 (Intermediary Agent) 6509=Not authorized for predefined creditor id (Approve, Update, Delete, Confirm) 6510=Not authorized. Agreement not found (Create) 6512=Bank details not found for IBAN (CreditorAgent) 6513=Creditor agent BIC is required (CreditorAgent) 6515=Creditor agent national id is required (CreditorAgent) 6516=Creditor agent national id is mandatory when creditor account is BBAN (CreditorAgent)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:import namespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1"/> <xs:import namespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1"/> <xs:import namespace="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com"/> <xs:element name="CreditorCreateRequest" type="tns:CreditorCreateRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to create a creditor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CreditorCreateResponse" type="tns:CreditorCreateResponseType"/> <xs:element name="CreditorConfirmRequest" type="tns:CreditorConfirmRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to confirm a created creditor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CreditorConfirmResponse" type="tns:CreditorConfirmResponseType"/> <xs:element name="CreditorSearchRequest" type="tns:CreditorSearchRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to search for creditors.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CreditorSearchResponse" type="tns:CreditorSearchResponseType"/> <xs:element name="CreditorUpdateRequest" type="tns:CreditorUpdateRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to update a creditor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CreditorUpdateResponse" type="tns:CreditorUpdateResponseType"/> <xs:element name="CreditorApproveRequest" type="tns:CreditorApproveRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to approve a created and confirmed creditor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CreditorApproveResponse" type="tns:CreditorApproveResponseType"/> <xs:element name="CreditorDeleteRequest" type="tns:CreditorDeleteRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to delete a creditor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CreditorDeleteResponse" type="tns:CreditorDeleteResponseType"/> <xs:complexType name="CreditorCreateRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="creditorInformation" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditor"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditorCreateResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="creditorInformation" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditor"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="predefinedCreditorState" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditorState"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="predefinedCreditorId" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditorId"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditorUpdateRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="creditorInformation" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditor"/> <xs:element name="predefinedCreditorId" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditorId"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditorUpdateResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="creditorInformation" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditor"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="predefinedCreditorState" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditorState"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="predefinedCreditorId" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditorId"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditorConfirmRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="predefinedCreditorId" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditorId"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditorConfirmResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"/> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditorSearchRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="searchCriteria" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditorSearchCriteria"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditorSearchResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="elementControl" type="co:ElementControlOut"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="creditorInformation" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditorSearchResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditorApproveRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="predefinedCreditorId" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditorId"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditorApproveResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"/> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditorDeleteRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="predefinedCreditorId" type="crtr:PredefinedCreditorId"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditorDeleteResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"/> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21"> <xsd:complexType name="ClientContextType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="userid" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies the person who initiated the action This could either be the customer itself in a netbank) or an employee</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="credentials" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Authorization data. This is typically a security Object retriewed from a logon, but can also be a plain password.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="channel" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicated what type of application that initiated the request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="orgid" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The OrganizationalId - will in a banking context be Financial Institution / Konsernnr</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="orgunit" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Organizational unit will in a banking context be Branch / Registernr</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="customerid" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Id of the customer on which the operation is requested, may be the same as userid, but may well be different</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="locale" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Locale in a java syntax e.g "en_EN". May be used if application supports localized response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ip" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The ip adress of the client</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="item" nillable="true" type="itemType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Optionnal extention items - Add key/value pairs for application specific extentions</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="itemType"> <xsd:attribute name="key" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="value" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EDBHeaderType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="SourceApplication" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies the source that initiated the message. Used to separate different service consumers.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DestinationApplication" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies the destination of the message. Used to separate different service providers.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Function" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies the service to be called.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Version" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Service version "X.Y.Z" according to this standard: X = Main release (major changes, not necessarily backwards compatible) Y = Minor release (backwards compatible, new functionality) Z = Bugfix (backwards compatible, error correction only)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ClientContext" type="ClientContextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Elements for identifying client context information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="AutHeader" type="EDBHeaderType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseStateType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ErrorCode" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Numeric error code reported for this error.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Severity" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Response Status Severity Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ComponentId" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique code identifying the component returning the service response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="StrErrorCode" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Deprecated: Error code represented as String</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Message" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Message describing the error. Default is english language. Optionally localized according to the locale parameter in the service request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="NativeError" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Deprecated: Optional detailed error information reported from involved components. Used for diagnostics purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="LogSequence" nillable="true" type="xsd:long"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Optional key generated to be used for log correlation purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="errorItem" nillable="true" type="errorItemType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Optional extention items - key/value pairs are used for extented error inforamtion.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="errorItemType"> <xsd:annotation/> <xsd:attribute name="key" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="value" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:edbheader="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1"> <xs:import namespace="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21"/> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ResponseState" type="edbheader:ResponseStateType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1"> <xs:simpleType name="ISODate"> <xs:restriction base="xs:date"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ISODateTime"> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max15NumericText"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{1,15}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DecimalNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="17"/> <xs:totalDigits value="18"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BaseOneRate"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="10"/> <xs:totalDigits value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Amount_SimpleType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="5"/> <xs:totalDigits value="18"/> <xs:minInclusive value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Amount_SimpleType_NoFractions"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="0"/> <xs:totalDigits value="12"/> <xs:minInclusive value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ChargeBearerTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="DEBT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>All transaction charges are to be borne by the debtor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="CRED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>All transaction charges are to be borne by the creditor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SHAR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>In a credit transfer context, means that transaction charges on the sender side are to be borne by the debtor, transaction charges on the receiver side are to be borne by the creditor. In a direct debit context, means that transaction charges on the sender side are to be borne by the creditor, transaction charges on the receiver side are to be borne by the debtor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SLEV"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Charges are to be applied following the rules agreed in the service level and/or scheme.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PriorityCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="HIGH"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Priority level is high.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="NORM"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Priority level is normal.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BICFIIdentifier"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{6,6}[A-Z2-9][A-NP-Z0-9]([A-Z0-9]{3,3}){0,1}"/> <xs:minLength value="8"/> <xs:maxLength value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,3}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CountryCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{2,2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PaymentTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_HIGH_VALUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_HIGH_VALUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_TRANSFER_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_TRANSFER_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_TRANSFER"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_TRANSFER</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_HIGH_VALUE_CHEQUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_HIGH_VALUE_CHEQUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_CHEQUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_CHEQUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_HIGH_VALUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_HIGH_VALUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_TRANSFER_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_TRANSFER_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_TRANSFER"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_TRANSFER</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CHEQUE_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CHEQUE_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CHEQUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CHEQUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_PAYMENT_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_PAYMENT_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_PAYMENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_PAYMENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_CHEQUE_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_CHEQUE_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_CHEQUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_CHEQUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SEPA"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SEPA</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="FOREIGN_ACCOUNT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>FOREIGN_ACCOUNT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_EINVOICE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_EINVOICE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PhoneNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\+[0-9]{1,3}-[0-9()+\-]{1,30}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max10Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max16Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max34Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="34"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="AnyBICIdentifier"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{6,6}[A-Z2-9][A-NP-Z0-9]([A-Z0-9]{3,3}){0,1}"/> <xs:minLength value="8"/> <xs:maxLength value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max30Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max35Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="35"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max40Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="40"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max50Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max70Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="70"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max128Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="128"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max140Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="140"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max170Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="170"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max105Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="105"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max254Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="254"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OriginalFormatCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="CLIENT_GENERATED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a client.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ISO"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from an ISO file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="NDR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a NDR file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TELEPAY"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a Telepay file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PAYMUL"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a Paymul file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SALARY_LIST"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a salary file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PAYMENT_LIST"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a payment list file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PREPAID_LIST"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a prepaid list file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="UNKNOWN"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unknown origin (migrated?)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1" xmlns:st="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1"> <xs:import namespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1"/> <xs:complexType name="PartyIdentification"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: Set of elements used to identify a person or an organisation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="postalAddress" type="tns:PostalAddress"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="faxNumber" type="st:PhoneNumber"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PostalAddress"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>PAYS can do validations against the country code (depending on which party/agent type it is). All other fields is information only, and is sent to Payment Engine without any form of validation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="addressType" type="tns:AddressTypeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO "Identifies the nature of the postal address. Values: ADDR, PBOX, HOME, BIZZ, MLTO, DLVY</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="department" type="st:Max70Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identification of a division of a large organisation or building."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="subDepartment" type="st:Max70Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identification of a sub-division of a large organisation or building."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="streetName" type="st:Max70Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Name of a street or thoroughfare."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="buildingNumber" type="st:Max16Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Number that identifies the position of a building on a street."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="postCode" type="st:Max16Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="townName" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Name of a built-up area, with defined boundaries, and a local government."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="countrySubDivision" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identifies a subdivision of a country such as state, region, county."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="country" type="st:CountryCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Nation with its own government."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="7" minOccurs="0" name="addressLine" type="st:Max70Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services, presented in free format text."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="AddressTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="ADDR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the complete postal address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PBOX"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is a postal office (PO) box.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="HOME"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the home address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="BIZZ"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the business address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MLTO"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the address to which mail is sent.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DLVY"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the address to which delivery is to take place.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="FinancialInstitutionIdentification"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Set of elements used to uniquely and unambiguously identify a financial institution or a branch of a financial institution."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="bic" type="st:BICFIIdentifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Code allocated to a financial institution by the ISO 9362 Registration Authority as described in ISO 9362; Banking - Banking telecommunication messages - Business identifier code (BIC)."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="nationalId" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Depending on validations against PBD, will be mapped against the following ISO fields: 1: MemberIdentification - "Identification of a member of a clearing system" 2: Other - ""Unique identification of an agent, as assigned by an institution, using an identification scheme Regarding 1, PAYS will also add a ClearingSystemIdentification to uniquely identify the agent within the correct clearing system of that country. This ID can be found in ISO's ExternalCodeList overview.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Name by which an agent is known and which is usually used to identify that agent."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="postalAddress" type="tns:PostalAddress"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ExchangeRate"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="exchangeRate" type="st:BaseOneRate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "The factor used for conversion of an amount from one currency to another. This reflects the price at which one currency was bought with another currency.""</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element default="SPOT" minOccurs="0" name="rateType" type="tns:ExchangeRateTypeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the type used to complete the currency exchange." Values: SPOT, SALE, AGRD</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="contractIdentification" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Unique and unambiguous reference to the foreign exchange contract agreed between the initiating party/creditor and the debtor agent."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ExchangeRateTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SPOT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Exchange rate applied is the rate agreed between the parties.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SALE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Exchange rate applied is the market rate at the time of the sale.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AGRD"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Exchange rate applied is the rate agreed between the parties.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentIdentification"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="messageIdentification" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Point to point reference, as assigned by the instructing party, and sent to the next party in the chain to unambiguously identify the message." Usage: The instructing party has to make sure that MessageIdentification is unique per instructed party for a pre-agreed period.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="endToEndIdentification" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Unique identification assigned by the initiating party to unumbiguously identify the transaction. This identification is passed on, unchanged, throughout the entire end-to-end chain. " NB! endToendIdentification will remain unchanged in updates (as opposed to other ids return in create response. This field is therefore a good canditate to follow a payment in audit trail.)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AmountTypeChoice"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="instructedAmount" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Amount of money to be moved between the debtor and creditor, before deduction of charges, expressed in the currency as ordered by the initiating party."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="equivalentAmount" type="tns:EquivalentAmount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Amount of money to be moved between the debtor and creditor, expressed in the currency of the debtor's account, and the currency in which the amount is to be moved.""</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="EquivalentAmount"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="amount" type="tns:Amount"/> <xs:element name="currencyOfTransfer" type="st:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the currency of the to be transferred amount, which is different from the currency of the debtor's account."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Account"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the details to identify an account.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="identification" type="st:Max34Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Account identifier; IBAN or other generic identifier</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="currency" type="st:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identification of the currency in which the account is held.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Amount"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="amount" type="st:Amount_SimpleType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="currency" type="st:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentAmounts"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains information regarding debit and credit amount along with counter values and conversionRate info. At least one of debitCounterValue and creditCounterValue is always set. This information is always recalculated in Read/Search</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="debitAmount" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount to be deducted from the debtor, expressed in the debtor account currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="creditAmount" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount to be transferred to the creditor, expressed in the transfer currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="debitCounterValue" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount to be deducted from the debtor, expressed in the base currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="creditCounterValue" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount to be transferred to the creditor, expressed in the base currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="conversionRateInfo" type="tns:ConversionRateInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Rate used to convert between the debit and credit amount.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ConversionRateInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="rate" type="st:BaseOneRate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "The factor used for conversion of an amount from one currency to another. This reflects the price at which one currency was bought with another currency."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="type" type="tns:ConversionRateTypeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the type of rate used when performing exchange rate conversion." Values: NONE, AGREED_RATE, SELL_RATE, BUY_RATE, MID_RATE, CROSS_RATE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="unitNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Describes the unit number. Possible values: 1 and 100.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:enumeration value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="100"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ConversionRateTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="NONE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>No conversion has been done.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AGREED_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using an agreed rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SELL_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using a sell rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="BUY_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using a buy rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MID_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using a mid rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="CROSS_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using a cross rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="RegulatoryReporting"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Information needed due to regulatory and statutory requirements.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="st:Max10Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the nature, purpose, and reason for the transaction to be reported for regulatory and statutory requirements in a coded form. " A PBD-service can provide these codes.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="information" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Additional details that cater for specific domestic regulatory requirements.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="InstructionForCreditorAgent"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="code" type="tns:InstructionForCreditorAgentCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Coded information related to the processing of the payment instruction, provided by the initiating party, and intended for the creditor's agent." Values: CHQB, HOLD, PHOB, TELB</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="instructionInformation" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Further information complementing the coded instruction or instruction to the creditor's agent that is bilaterally agreed or specific to a user community."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="InstructionForCreditorAgentCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="CHQB"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(Ultimate) creditor must be paid by cheque.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="HOLD"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount of money must be held for the (ultimate) creditor, who will call. Pay on identification.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PHOB"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Please advise/contact (ultimate) creditor/claimant by phone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TELB"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Please advise/contact (ultimate) creditor/claimant by the most efficient means of telecommunication.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="Approval"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="dateOfApproval" type="st:ISODate"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="approverFirstName" type="st:Max35Text"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="approverLastName" type="st:Max35Text"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Approver"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="approverFirstName" type="st:Max35Text"/> <xs:element name="approverLastName" type="st:Max35Text"/> <xs:element name="identification" type="st:Max35Text"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:edbheader="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com"> <xs:complexType name="ElementControlIn"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="StartIndex" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="MaximumNumberOfElements" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ElementControlOut"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="StartIndex" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="NumberOfElements" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="MoreElementsAvailable" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1" xmlns:st="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1" xmlns:ct="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1" xmlns:co="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com"> <xs:import namespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1"/> <xs:import namespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1"/> <xs:import namespace="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com"/> <xs:simpleType name="PredefinedCreditorId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A technical key generated by the Create operation. Update/confirm/approve/delete requests must refer to this ID.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:long"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="PredefinedCreditor"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="alias" type="st:Max50Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>An alias for the predefined creditor. Is optional and duplicates are allowed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="type" type="tns:PredefinedCreditorTypeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Separate between Domestic and International predefined creditors. Values: DOMESTIC, INTERNATIONAL</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="currencyCode" type="st:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Saved payment currency for the predefined creditor. Can be used to save a commonly used currency for international creditor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="creditorAccount" type="st:Max34Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unambiguous identification of the account of the creditor to which a credit entry will be posted as a result of the payment transaction. Composed of following elements: - Identification - Type (IBAN/BBAN)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="creditor" type="ct:PartyIdentification"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Creditor information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="ultimateCreditor" type="ct:PartyIdentification"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Information of the Ultimate Creditor Identification, Name, Address and Country code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="creditorAgent" type="ct:FinancialInstitutionIdentification"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The creditor agent</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="supplierNumber" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>An unique identification of the creditor inside the the initiating party own systems</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="intermediaryAgent1" type="ct:FinancialInstitutionIdentification"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Information of the Intermediary Agent Name, BIC, Address and Country code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="intermediaryAgent2" type="ct:FinancialInstitutionIdentification"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Information of the Intermediary Agent Name, BIC, Address and Country code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="intermediaryAgent3" type="ct:FinancialInstitutionIdentification"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Information of the Intermediary Agent Name, BIC, Address and Country code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PredefinedCreditorSearchCriteria"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="alias" type="st:Max50Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A distinct alias for the predefined creditor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="type" type="tns:PredefinedCreditorTypeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Separate between Domestic and International predefined creditors. Values: DOMESTIC, INTERNATIONAL</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="creditorAccount" type="st:Max34Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unambiguous identification of the account of the creditor to which a credit entry will be posted as a result of the payment transaction. Composed of following elements: - Identification - Type (IBAN/BBAN)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="creditorName" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name by which the Creditor party is known and which is usually used to identify the party.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="supplierNumber" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>An unique identification of the creditor inside the The initiating party own systems</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="ultimateCreditorName" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The name of the ultimate creditor</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="predefinedCreditorState" type="tns:PredefinedCreditorState"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>State condition of the Pre-defined Creditor Values: VALIDATED, APPROVED, TO_BE_APPROVED, INCOMPLETE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="elementControl" type="co:ElementControlIn"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Start number of elements and Max number elements to be returned</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PredefinedCreditorSearchResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="predefinedCreditorId" type="tns:PredefinedCreditorId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unique and unambiguous way of identifying the predefined creditor</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="creditorInformation" type="tns:PredefinedCreditor"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Information about the predefined creditor</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="predefinedCreditorState" type="tns:PredefinedCreditorState"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>State condition of the Pre-defined Creditor. Values: VALIDATED, APPROVED, TO_BE_APPROVED, INCOMPLETE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="approvedBy" type="ct:Approver"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name and identification of the initatator who updated an approved the Creditor</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="approvalDate" type="st:ISODate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Date of the aproval of this Creditor</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="PredefinedCreditorState"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="VALIDATED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Validated</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="APPROVED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Approved</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TO_BE_APPROVED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>To be approved</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INCOMPLETE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Incomplete</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PredefinedCreditorTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Choose if domestic predefined creditor</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Choose if international predefined creditor</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="CreditorCreateResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:CreditorCreateResponse" name="CreditorCreateResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CreditorSearchRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch1:AutHeader" name="SoapHeader"></wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="tns:CreditorSearchRequest" name="CreditorSearchRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CreditorSearchResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:CreditorSearchResponse" name="CreditorSearchResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CreditorDeleteRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch1:AutHeader" name="SoapHeader"></wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="tns:CreditorDeleteRequest" name="CreditorDeleteRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CreditorCreateRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch1:AutHeader" name="SoapHeader"></wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="tns:CreditorCreateRequest" name="CreditorCreateRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CreditorDeleteResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:CreditorDeleteResponse" name="CreditorDeleteResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message
